title: I lost my account
body: I recently downloaded the patch 6.20 and I tried to login to my account but it said the username and password combination was "invalid". So I try again and it still doesn't work. I then went to try and login at the website but it said that there was account. I have sent a couple of emails to Riot support, but have not received any emails.

replies.body: When you have the patcher open, is NA select on the top right?  It may just be a matter of signing into the wrong region.  If not, check out our [account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) for assistance on recovering your account.  If you still have problems getting access back, we're happy to help through a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Let me know if you have any questions!

Can you tell me if my account is still here or if something happened to it? The summoner name was "SwagaMcMuffins". I just hope it's still there because I spent some money on it and the account was my main account.

I have been on NA for the patcher and I have submitted 2 support tickets but I am still waiting for a reply. I think it could've been something wrong that happened with the updating because my account was fine before patch 6.20. But as soon as it was downloaded I lost my account for some reason.
